revised_title: Gaseous Radon Circulation and Accumulation in Lunar Fines
tldr: This study investigates the accumulation and circulation of gaseous radon between lunar fines, providing evidence for a gaseous radon circulation in the Moon's regolith. The research also examines the soil-atmosphere noble gas exchanges and the validity of U-Pb dating methods. The findings contribute to a better understanding of the Moon's geology and soil composition.
scientific_discipline: Environmental and Earth Sciences > Geology and Soil Science
